NC.Q: Between the flows from node Ticket Sales to node Playoffs and from node Tennis to node Corporate Groups, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Baseball to node Local Fans, from node Basketball to node Local Fans, and from node Sponsorships to node Exhibition, which path has the largest flow?
